HomeWiki:
Project Description
这是一个个人的Windowsphone7游戏的开源项目。
This is a personalopen source project for Windowsphone7 game .
In MarketPlace url:http://www.windowsphone.com/en-AU/apps/a53d256f-3bc7-4618-86b0-778496b8e976

重要说明：该游戏是体感游戏，必须在真机上才可以玩
This game is the body feeling game, must use induction equipment

One day, my wife wants to make a game for our daughter form daughter's play, this is her first works when She learn from me for two weeks later.
My wife is a nurse,she never learned program development,complete with complete "Expression express"

我老婆一天想给女儿开发一个游戏，灵感来自女儿喜欢把储钱罐摇晃出来钱币再塞回去的动作，她向我学习了两个然后就尝试着做出来第一个作品。
她是一个护士，从来没学过程序开发，完全用Expression的学习版就完成了。
